name: IMCapture
tag_list: software, windows, mac, macos, skype, yahoo, facetime, record, call, audio, video, file, converter, cat, session
overview:
IMCapture is a Software Development Company that specializes in the production and distribution of Mac and Windows software and technologies. IMCapture has been developing and marketing recording software for Instant Messengers such as, Skype, Yahoo and FaceTime for business and home users. All applications offered by IMCapture provide flawless recording of online conversations.

IMCapture recording software steps over the timeframes enabling users to capture essential details of past communication. These programs will be always a benefit for journalists, office-workers, students studying on-line since they record and immediately archive the most important nuances of video conference calls and all sorts of negotiations. IMCapture managed to develop universal recording applications that would be useful in different spheres of life.

The company offers a wide range of high-quality applications worked out to record and save audio and video calls made via Skype, Yahoo and FaceTime. All recording software is embedded with a worry-free converter, which facilitates and speeds up recording and conversion process. Functionality and convenience of work with the program are one of the main priorities for IMCapture production.

IMCapture focuses mostly on the output quality of the recorded files. IMCapture recording tools give an advantage of adjusting sound and image quality manually. Advanced audio and video settings allow to adapt codec and bitrate resolution. All programs released by IMCapture meet requirements even of the most demanding customers.

Thus the strategy and nature of our business is to improve the quality and features of our products, become more recognizable on professional recording software market for popular Instant Messengers, attract new customers, increase productivity, reduce the cost to make the software available for business of any size, and come to be more high speed development oriented.
